title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt & David Thomas
description: Classic guide that distills pragmatic wisdom for professional software developers.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship focused on writing readable, maintainable code.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Practical strategies on building good habits and breaking bad ones through small changes.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: Memoir about growing up in a survivalist family and pursuing education against all odds.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Explores the history and impact of Homo sapiens from the Stone Age to modern times.
